Name: The Tourist
Ingredients: 35 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and strain into an espresso cup.
History: South African Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail created by Nick Koumbarakis of Cape Town, South Africa.
Garnish: Orange zest, BACARDÍ 151 rum & saffron mist
